channel.title: Experiences on Daniel Dia's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Experiences on Daniel Dia's Website

item.title: Member of the Events Subcabinet
item.description: Selected as a member of the Events Subcabinet of the AUB Math Society, contributing to planning and running their current and upcoming events.

item.title: Technical Officer â€” Software Development team
item.description: Selected as the Technical Officer at the Software Development team of the Google Developer Groups Groups (GDG) on Campus @AUB club.

item.title: Full Stack Software Engineering Intern
item.description: Member of the full-stack development team, responsible for the end-to-end development of a new web platform for our client LiveLunger.

item.title: LIFE Scholar
item.description: Selected as a scholar for my CCE degree at AUB, recognized for dedication to academic excellence and alignment with LIFE’s mission and values.

item.title: Wikipedia Contributor (Volunteer)
item.description: Drove over 1.2 million reader views on edited articles through 150+ enhancements, earning 70+ commendations (’thanks’) from the editorial community.
